definition: never move your four limbs, can't distinguish the five crops (idiom); living as a parasite
pinyin: si4 ti3 bu4 qin2 , wu3 gu3 bu4 fen1

definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to eat three square meals a day and do no work (idiom)/to be sated with food and remain idle
pinyin: bao3 shi2 zhong1 ri4 , wu2 suo3 yong4 xin1

definition: to spend the whole day eating (i.e. not doing any work)
not paying attention to anything (idiom); to idle time away
without learning or skills (idiom); ignorant and incompetent
lit. the eye cannot recognize the letter T (idiom); totally illiterate
not to do anything productive/to idle away one's time
lit. cannot tell beans from wheat (idiom); fig. ignorant of practical matters
not having any special skill/without any qualifications
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
stinking intellectual (contemptuous term for educated people during the Cultural Revolution)
lit. a nobleman stays clear of the kitchen (idiom, from Mencius)/fig. a nobleman who has seen a living animal cannot bear to see it die, hence he keeps away from the kitchen
